comment.author: 33201853@N05
comment._content: He is so tiny. He hardly looks real. Wonder what became of him.  He may have been an adult by the first world war.  Did he make it past that?  How about the Spanish flu, polio, the Blitz (assuming he was British)? Old pictures like this always leave me wondering.  Great picture.
